content: From the given context character, Please provide the stats for the character following the format of 'STR: value (+value), DEX: value (+value), CON: value (+value), INT: value (+value), WIS: value (+value), CHA: value (+value)' and give it a value between 0 and 10 according to the character context. The value inside the ( ) can be positive or negative, don't follow dungeon and dragons rules, make your own rules. Just give me the map of keys and values. No markdown.
